data.message: Facebook. Why won't you block the page cat shooting ? Petition to get this page removed! http://www.change.org/petitions/facebook-remove-this-disgusting-page-that-promotes-the-killing-of-domestic-cats#

replies.message: Hi Sonja. Thanks for brining this to our attention. Please follow these steps to report the Page: http://on.fb.me/1iOZUpM. When something gets reported to Facebook, we'll review it and remove anything that violates our Community Standards. You can also follow the status of the report from the Support Dashboard: http://on.fb.me/1iOZShH -Natalie

CELA NE SERT A RIEN: Ce qui est tendance sur facebook est de sortir toutes les saloperies tant que facebook fait de l’audience, facebook en à rien à foutre. STOP A LA HAINE DE QUI QUE SE SOIT CONTRE QUI QUE SE SOIT.
